languages.text: Излучение маяка, ранее зафиксированное авгурами, оказывается жестокой ловушкой для штурмового отряда — воздействуя на разум солдат, оно посылает им ужасные видения жестоких смертей и мучительных пыток, не давая подойти ближе к маяку и грузу. Возникающие прямо в мозгу образы чудовищных расправ могли бы доставить экстатическое удовольствие друкари, но даже закаленные в сражениях бойцы с трудом могут вынести их.

traits.locale_text: Излучение маяка, ранее зафиксированное авгурами, оказывается жестокой ловушкой для штурмового отряда — воздействуя на разум солдат, оно посылает им ужасные видения жестоких смертей и мучительных пыток, не давая подойти ближе к маяку и грузу. Возникающие прямо в мозгу образы чудовищных расправ могли бы доставить экстатическое удовольствие друкари, но даже закаленные в сражениях бойцы с трудом могут вынести их.

languages.text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.
languages.original_text: Излучение маяка, ранее зафиксированное авгурами, оказывается жестокой ловушкой для штурмового отряда — воздействуя на разум солдат, оно посылает им ужасные видения жестоких смертей и мучительных пыток, не давая подойти ближе к маяку и грузу. Возникающие прямо в мозгу образы чудовищных расправ могли бы доставить экстатическое удовольствие друкари, но даже закаленные в сражениях бойцы с трудом могут вынести их.

traits.locale_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augur turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating tortures, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of abominable fates appearing right in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even the warriors tempered by battle can scarcely bear them.

The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augur turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating tortures, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of abominable fates appearing right in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even the warriors tempered by battle can scarcely bear them.

The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵探测到的信标不断向外辐射着信号，突击小队落入了这残酷的陷阱之中。辐射的信号直接作用在了士兵的思想上，在他们的脑海中制造出了无数残忍死亡与痛苦折磨的可怖幻象，阻止他们接近信标与集装箱。这些恐怖的画面直接出现在脑海之中，会为黑暗灵族带来狂喜，但对于人类的战士而言，即便是身经百战的老兵也难以承受这些幻象。
languages.original_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

traits.locale_text: 俄歇矩阵探测到的信标不断向外辐射着信号，突击小队落入了这残酷的陷阱之中。辐射的信号直接作用在了士兵的思想上，在他们的脑海中制造出了无数残忍死亡与痛苦折磨的可怖幻象，阻止他们接近信标与集装箱。这些恐怖的画面直接出现在脑海之中，会为黑暗灵族带来狂喜，但对于人类的战士而言，即便是身经百战的老兵也难以承受这些幻象。

languages.text: スキャナーが探知したビーコンの放射は、アサルト・スカッドにとって恐ろしい罠であることが判明した。兵士たちの心に作用し、残酷な死や耐え難い拷問の恐ろしい幻覚を見せ、ビーコンや積荷に近づくのを妨げるのだ。このような忌まわしい運命が直接脳裏に浮かぶイメージは、デュカーリに恍惚とした喜びをもたらすであろうが、戦いで鍛え上げられた戦士でさえ、それに耐えることはほとんどできない。
languages.original_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーが探知したビーコンの放射は、アサルト・スカッドにとって恐ろしい罠であることが判明した。兵士たちの心に作用し、残酷な死や耐え難い拷問の恐ろしい幻覚を見せ、ビーコンや積荷に近づくのを妨げるのだ。このような忌まわしい運命が直接脳裏に浮かぶイメージは、デュカーリに恍惚とした喜びをもたらすであろうが、戦いで鍛え上げられた戦士でさえ、それに耐えることはほとんどできない。

languages.text: Las emisiones de la baliza detectadas por los augures resultan ser una cruel trampa para el escuadrón de asalto: actuando sobre la mente de los soldados, les envía horribles visiones de muertes brutales y torturas atroces, impidiéndoles acercarse a la baliza y al cargamento. Las imágenes de un destino tan abominable apareciendo directamente en el cerebro habrían proporcionado un placer extasiante a un Drukhari, pero incluso aquellos guerreros curtidos por la batalla apenas pueden resistirlas.
languages.original_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

traits.locale_text: Las emisiones de la baliza detectadas por los augures resultan ser una cruel trampa para el escuadrón de asalto: actuando sobre la mente de los soldados, les envía horribles visiones de muertes brutales y torturas atroces, impidiéndoles acercarse a la baliza y al cargamento. Las imágenes de un destino tan abominable apareciendo directamente en el cerebro habrían proporcionado un placer extasiante a un Drukhari, pero incluso aquellos guerreros curtidos por la batalla apenas pueden resistirlas.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Die Emissionen des Senders, den die Auguren entdeckt hatten, entpuppten sich als grausame Falle für den Sturmtrupp. Das Signal wirkt sich auf den Verstand der Soldaten aus. Es sendet ihnen grauenhafte Visionen, wie sie qualvoll gefoltert werden und auf schreckliche Weise sterben. Das hindert sie daran, dem Sender und der Fracht näherzukommen. Dass Bilder eines solch widerwärtigen Schicksals direkt im Gehirn erscheinen, hätte einem Drukhari wahre Ekstase verschafft, doch selbst die abgehärtesten und kampferprobtesten Krieger können die Visionen kaum ertragen.
languages.original_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

traits.locale_text: Die Emissionen des Senders, den die Auguren entdeckt hatten, entpuppten sich als grausame Falle für den Sturmtrupp. Das Signal wirkt sich auf den Verstand der Soldaten aus. Es sendet ihnen grauenhafte Visionen, wie sie qualvoll gefoltert werden und auf schreckliche Weise sterben. Das hindert sie daran, dem Sender und der Fracht näherzukommen. Dass Bilder eines solch widerwärtigen Schicksals direkt im Gehirn erscheinen, hätte einem Drukhari wahre Ekstase verschafft, doch selbst die abgehärtesten und kampferprobtesten Krieger können die Visionen kaum ertragen.

languages.text: Les émissions captées un peu plus tôt par les augures se révèlent un piège cruel pour l'escouade d'assaut: agissant directement sur l'esprit des soldats, elles leur insufflent d'horribles visions de mort brutale et d'indicibles tourments, comme pour les tenir à distance de la balise et de la cargaison. Les images atroces qui leur apparaissent auraient conféré une jouissance extatique à un Drukhari, mais ces combattants pourtant aguerris ont le plus grand mal à y résister.
languages.original_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.

traits.locale_text: Les émissions captées un peu plus tôt par les augures se révèlent un piège cruel pour l'escadron d'assaut : agissant directement sur l'esprit des soldats, elles leur insufflent d'horribles visions de mort brutale et d'indicibles tourments, comme pour les tenir à distance de la balise et de la cargaison. Les images atroces qui leur apparaissent auraient conféré une jouissance extatique à un Drukhari, mais ces combattants pourtant aguerris ont le plus grand mal à y résister.

languages.text: Alametlerin önceden tespit ettiği emisyonların, taarruz mangası için kurulmuş, acımasız bir tuzak olduğu ortaya çıkıyor. Doğrudan askerlerin zihinlerine etki ediyor, sanki onları parıldak ve kargodan uzak tutmak istercesine acımasız bir ölüm ve tarifsiz işkence görüleri aşılıyorlar. Gördükleri rahatsız edici görüntüler, Drukharilere zevk verip onları kendilerinden geçirebilirdi. Gelgelelim bu çetin savaşçılar, görülere direnmekte büyük zorluk çekiyor.
languages.original_text: The emissions of the beacon previously detected by augurs turn out to be a cruel trap for the assault squad — acting on the soldiers' minds, it sends them horrible visions of brutal deaths and excruciating torture, preventing them from coming closer to the beacon and the cargo. The images of such abominable fates appearing directly in the brain would have brought ecstatic pleasure to a Drukhari, but even those warriors tempered by battle can scarcely withstand them.
